news.title: AMD unveils new AI PC processors for general use and gaming at CES
news.summary: AMD announced the latest version of its AI-powered PC chips designed for a variety of tasks from gaming to content creation and multitasking.

news.summary: Insight Partners sued by former vice president Kate Lowry.

news.title: Microsoft’s Nadella wants us to stop thinking of AI as ‘slop’
news.summary: Nadella wants us to think of AI as a human helper instead of a slop-generating job killer. New data for 2026 indicates he could be right.

news.title: This is Uber’s new robotaxi from Lucid and Nuro
news.summary: The production-intent version, unveiled at CES 2026 on Monday, will be an exceptionally roomy entry into the growing robotaxi market later this year.

news.title: Nvidia wants to be the Android of generalist robotics
news.summary: Nvidia unveiled a full-stack robotics ecosystem at CES 2026, including foundation models, simulation tools, and hardware. It wants to be the default platform for robotics.

news.title: Nvidia’s GeForce Now is getting native Linux and Fire TV apps
news.summary: Nvidia's RTX 5080 rollout for its GeForce Now cloud gaming service is now complete, so it's ready to announce some additional features for subscribers. In the coming months, Nvidia is planning to launch native GeForce Now apps for Linux and Amazon's Fire TV devices, alongside flight control support

news.title: Nvidia’s new G-Sync monitors automatically adjust brightness just like a laptop
news.summary: Nvidia is bringing a new set of G-Sync Pulsar monitors to the market this week that will automatically adjust brightness and color based on the ambient lighting in a room. news.title: Nvidia announces DLSS 4.5 with 6x Frame Generation and improved image quality
news.summary: Nvidia is announcing its next major update to its Deep Learning Super Sampling (DLSS) feature at CES today. news.title: Emerson’s SmartVoice devices follow verbal instructions without Wi-Fi or a hub
news.summary: A new line of small appliances and devices from IAI Smart, billed as Emerson Smart products, are now available that will let you operate fans, heaters, smart plugs, and air fryers with your voice - with no apps, Wi-Fi, or smart home connection at all. news.title: Alienware is working on new slim and cheaper gaming laptops
news.summary: Dell-owned Alienware is looking to reach a wider swath of gamers, announcing at CES 2026 that it's working on two new laptops: one with a lower, entry-level price and one with an ultra-slim chassis. news.title: Intel launches Core Ultra Series 3 CPUs, made using its long-awaited 18A process
news.summary: New chips launch "this month," targeting high-end ultraportable PCs.

news.title: Under anti-vaccine RFK Jr., CDC slashes childhood vaccine schedule
news.summary: The changes are modeled after a small country with universal health care.

news.title: The nation’s strictest privacy law just took effect, to data brokers’ chagrin
news.summary: Californians can now submit demands requiring 500 brokers to delete their data.

news.title: Jensen Huang Says Nvidia’s New Vera Rubin Chips Are in ‘Full Production’
news.summary: The chip giant says Vera Rubin will sharply cut the cost of training and running AI models, strengthening the appeal of its integrated computing platform.

news.title: Google Gemini Is Taking Control of Humanoid Robots on Auto Factory Floors
news.summary: Google DeepMind and Boston Dynamics are teaming up to integrate Gemini into a humanoid robot called Atlas.

news.title: These On-Ear Beats Headphones Are Marked Down by $70
news.summary: What these headphones lack in active noise canceling, they make up for with big, bold sound.

news.title: Lego’s Smart Brick Gives the Iconic Analog Toy a New Digital Brain
news.summary: The new sensor-packed Smart Play Brick will land this spring as part of a special Star Wars collection. The update adds interactive lights and sound to the Lego experience—including the minifigs.

news.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Trifold Hands-On: This Is the Phone-Tablet Hybrid You’re Looking For
news.summary: At CES 2026, we went hands-on with the three-panel Samsung tablet that folds up to the size of a (large) phone.
